channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How 'Human-Kind' AI Can Reshape Your Business
item.description: As AI models mature, their impact on the economy is becoming increasingly profound, offering unprecedented opportunities for innovation and efficiency...

item.title: The lazy jugglers
item.description: The best jugglers don’t seem to be trying very hard. That’s because they understand what the work involves, and they don’t confuse effort with results...

item.title: AI Reality Check: Why Data Is The Key To Breaking The Hype Cycle
item.description: For companies that rush to build GenAI tools on top of a broken data foundation, disillusionment awaits.

item.title: Aerodynamic figureheads

item.title: This Biotech Startup Raised $12.5 Million To Find Bacteria That Help Fight Cancer
item.description: Kanvas Biosciences aims to create a “Google Maps” for the microbiome that can help fine-tune treatments for cancer and other diseases.

item.title: Meaningfully informed
